verses.name: Luke 4:21
verses.text: And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.

verses.name: Luke 4:22
verses.text: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph’s son?

verses.name: Luke 4:23
verses.text: And he said unto them, Ye will surely say unto me this proverb, Physician, heal thyself: whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.

verses.name: Luke 4:24
verses.text: And he said, Verily I say unto you, No prophet is accepted in his own country.
